interface.name: org.alljoyn.SmartSpaces.Environment.HorizontalWindDirection
interface.description: This interface is for controlling horizontal wind direction of a device.

property.name: MaxDirection
property.description: Maximum value allowed for a target wind direction

property.name: AutoMode
property.description: Represent enabled/disabled state of the auto mode. AutoMode is for controlling horizontal wind direction automatically.

method.name: ChangeWindDirection
method.description: Invoke this method to change wind direction

method.name: EnableAutoMode
method.description: Invoke this method to enable the auto mode
